entries.label: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
Ministry Of New and Renewable Energy
Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
Ministry of Women and Child Development
Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
Ministry Of Personnel, Public Grievances And Pensions
Ministry Of Petroleum and Natural Gas
Comptroller And Auditor General Of India
Ministry Of Environment,forests and climate change
Ministry Of Consumer Affairs, Food And Public Distribution
Ministry Of Development Of North Eastern Region
Ministry Of Statistics and Programme Implementation
NITI Aayog (National Institution for Transforming India)

fields.schemeName: Sardar Patel Agriculture Research Award
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Sardar Patel Agriculture Research Award” was launched by the Department of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Government of Gujarat on 30.10.1995.

fields.schemeName: Jagananna Vidya Kanuka
fields.briefDescription: “Jagananna Vidya Kanuka” is a scheme by the School Education Dept. of the Govt. of Andhra Pradesh. The scheme aims to minimize dropouts, improve the gross Enrolment ratio, improve students' participation in learning activities, and thereby improve the learning outcomes of the children.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Education
fields.schemeName: AICTE-INAE Distinguished Visiting Professorship Scheme
fields.briefDescription: All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and Indian National Academy of Engineering (INAE) distinguished visiting Professor scheme envisages promotion of industry-institute interaction.

fields.schemeName: Madhyamik Drop-out Coaching
fields.briefDescription: The scheme of "Madhyamik Drop-out Coaching" was introduced by the Tribal Welfare Department, Directorate of Tribal Welfare, Govt. of Tripura. The scheme has the objective of providing coaching to the un-successful Madhyamik ST students who could not succeed due to various reasons of inconveniences.

fields.schemeName: Internship Policy Of The Madhya Pradesh Tourism Board
fields.briefDescription: The Internship Policy of the Madhya Pradesh Tourism Board intends to provide practical training experience (in summer/ winter etc.) to the students studying in various hospitality / tourism-related schools in Madhya Pradesh or outside the state.

fields.schemeName: Widow / Destitute Women Pension Scheme - Punjab
fields.briefDescription: Punjab State Government started a pension for widow and destitute women.

fields.schemeName: Allowance To Eunuchs Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Allowance to Eunuchs Scheme” was launched by the Department of Social Justice and Empowerment, Government of Haryana on 1st June 2006. Under the scheme, the state government provides financial assistance to eunuchs who are living in various parts of the State.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Medhavi Vidhyarti Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The Madhya Pradesh Government Started a scheme "Mukhyamantri Medhavi Vidyarthi Yojana" in 2018 for higher education.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister’s Free Diagnostic Services
fields.briefDescription: The Chief Minister’s free diagnostic services is envisaged to ensure the availability of a minimum set of diagnostic services at government-run health institutions. Under the program, CT scan, X-Ray, and laboratory services are provided free of cost to all irrespective of APL and BPL citizens.

fields.schemeName: Incentive For The Devadasi Children’s Marriage
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, the Social Welfare Department, Government of Karnataka will give incentives of ₹3.00 lakh for men,₹5.00 lakh for women to the Devadasi's Children who are Married Couples.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Education
fields.schemeName: AICTE-Training programs for Physical Education Trainers/Sport-Games Teachers/Director of Sports
fields.briefDescription: Training programs for Physical Education Trainers/Sport-Games Teachers/Director of Sports, aims to support institution in conducting trainings to develop the skill of the participants to involve the masses in traditional sports/games and fun games for physical activity through recreation.

fields.schemeName: Mukhiya Mantri Protsahan Yojna
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Mukhiya Mantri Protsahan Yojna” was launched by Dept. of Higher Education, H.P. during the year 2013-14. Under the scheme, an Incentive/Award will be given to students of the State who are selected and take admission for a degree course in any IIT/AIIMS/IIM/ISM Dhanbad/IISc Bangalore.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Health & Family Welfare
fields.schemeName: Short Term Fellowship under the Human Resource Development Programme for Health Research
fields.briefDescription: Short Term Fellowship under the Human Resource Development Programme for Health Research aims to provide advanced training in India & abroad to medical and health research personnel in cutting-edge research areas related to medicine & health.

fields.schemeName: Popularisation Of Fishery Machinery/ Equipments/ Implements” For Intensive Aquaculture In Odisha For The Financial Year 2021-22
fields.briefDescription: The aim of the "Popularisation of Fishery Machinery/ Equipments/ Implements” for Intensive Aquaculture in Odisha for the Financial Year 2021-22" scheme is to provide subsidy support to farmers/ fishers.

fields.schemeName: Grant of Financial Assistance to the Poor Parents Having Only One Girl Child Who is Studying 8th to 10th Standard
fields.briefDescription: This scheme was introduced to promote small family norms, uplift the welfare of girl children, and ease the financial burden on parents during their daughter's marriage. The scheme provides ₹25,000/- financial assistance for single girl children studying in 8th to 10th standard.

fields.schemeName: Sant Ravidaas Shiksha Protsaahan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: "Sant Ravidas Shiksha Protsahan Yojana" is a scholarship program launched by the Uttar Pradesh government. The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to the children of construction workers for their education.

fields.schemeName: State Welfare Scheme For Purohits
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "State Welfare Scheme for Purohits" was launched in September 2020 to benefit the financially distressed practicing temple /tribal purohit or priests of other communities like Christians, Jain, and Buddhists.

fields.schemeName: Stipend Scheme For Poultry Farming Training For Divyang People
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Stipend Scheme for Poultry Farming Training for Divyang People” was launched by the Department of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Government of Gujarat to raise the income of Divyang poultry farmers through scientific poultry farming training.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Finance
fields.schemeName: Post Office Monthly Income Scheme
fields.briefDescription: POMIS is an investment scheme recognized and validated by the Ministry of Finance. It is one of the highest-earning schemes with an interest rate of 6.6%. The interest in this scheme is disbursed monthly. After opening a POMIS account, individuals can invest a minimum amount of ₹1500.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: New Swarnima Scheme For Women
fields.briefDescription: A term loan scheme by the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment for women entrepreneurs from backward classes to obtain a loan of up to ₹2,00,000/- @ 5% per annum, thereby providing them social & financial security.

fields.schemeName: Mukhya Mantri Krishi Sa Sajuli Yozana - Assam
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Mukhya Mantri Krishi Sa Sajuli Yojana” is a State Owned Priority Development (SOPD) scheme for farmers launched by the Assam government in FY 2018-19.  The main purpose of launching this scheme for farmers is their holistic development by implementing several farm mechanization schemes.

fields.schemeName: Short Term Loan Scheme
fields.briefDescription: "Short Term Loan Scheme" provides financial assistance/ loan as a credit to individuals from the Scheduled Tribe Community to meet the immediate expenses towards Education, Medical and Business needs. The scheme aims to improve their standard of living.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Yuva Swarojgar Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chief Minister Youth Self-Employment Scheme CG MMYSY Yojana 2023 This scheme has been started by the state government to make the youth of Chhattisgarh self-employed and make them economically independent and self-reliant.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana - Special Projects
fields.briefDescription: A skill development scheme by Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship for Marginalized or vulnerable groups which may not meet all the parameters as laid down in the Guidelines of ShortTerm Training (STT) of PMKVY 3.0

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of New and Renewable Energy
fields.schemeName: National Renewable Energy Fellowship Scheme of the Human Resource Development Programme in New and Renewable Energy
fields.briefDescription: Through this scheme, fellowships will be provided for pursuing higher studies/ advanced research in renewable energy. The fellowship scheme is directly aligned with the overall requirement of renewable energy, research thrust areas identified by MNRE.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Commerce And Industry
fields.schemeName: Internship Program At The Indian Patent Office
fields.briefDescription: The Internship Program by the Indian Patent Office recognizes the abundance of creative and innovative energies that flow in India, and the need to tap into and channelize these energies. The program aims to work towards the fulfilment of the objectives of the National IPR Policy.

fields.schemeName: Shravanbal Seva State Pension Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Shravanbal Seva State Pension Scheme" is a Pension Scheme by the Department of Social Justice & Special Assistance, Govt. of Maharashtra. In this scheme, a monthly pension of ₹ 600/- is provided to destitute persons in the state of Maharashtra.

fields.schemeName: Tejaswini-the Radiant
fields.briefDescription: A scheme to provide financial assistance to the young women for setting up gainful self-employment ventures, suited to their skills, training, aptitude and local conditions.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: Agroforestry component under RKVY
fields.briefDescription: Sub-Mission on Agroforestry was launched in 2016-17 to promote plantation on farmlands along with agricultural crops. The scheme aims to increase farm income, expand tree cover and promote better carbon sequestration for climate change adaptation and mitigation.

fields.schemeName: State Reward to the Recipient of National Award
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "State Reward to the Recipient of National Award" has been designed by the Directorate of Art and Culture, Government of Goa as a token of appreciation in order to support and promote the local artists, who have received recognition at the National and International levels.

fields.schemeName: Attendance Scholarship Scheme for Girl Students with Disabilities of Rural Areas
fields.briefDescription: The objective of this scheme is to uplift the status of the girls with disabilities in the rural areas & also to make them reliant by paying incentives in the form of Attendance Scholarship to these girls.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Defence
fields.schemeName: Agnipath Yojana
fields.briefDescription: A welfare scheme by the Department of Military Affairs, MoD under which rigorous military training will be imparted to the youth aged between 17.5 to 23 years and meeting other educational, physical, and medical criteria, who are aspirational to be a part of the armed forces.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Health & Family Welfare
fields.schemeName: Nikshay Poshan Yojana (Nutritional Support To TB Patients)
fields.briefDescription: An incentive scheme under National Health Mission (NHM) by Central TB Division of MoHFW for Tuberculosis (TB) patients who are under treatment and have registered / notified themselves on the NIKSHAY portal. The incentives can be distributed in Cash or in Kind.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Garima Greh Shelter Homes For Transgender Persons
fields.briefDescription: Garima Greh aims to provide shelter to Destitute & abandoned Transgender persons with basic amenities like shelter, food, medical care and recreational facilities.

fields.schemeName: Distance Education Scholarship–Scholarship For Disabled Students Pursuing Degree, PG Courses
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Distance Education Scholarship–Scholarship for Disabled Students Pursuing Degree, PG Courses” was launched by the Department of Social Justice, Government of Kerala.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi
fields.briefDescription: Farmer welfare scheme by Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare to provide income support to all landholding farmers' families in the country to supplement their financial needs for procuring various inputs related to agriculture and allied activities as well as domestic needs.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance To Purchase Singel Net / Small Rampon Net & Its Accessories
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Financial Assistance To Purchase Singel Net / Small Rampon Net & Its Accessories” is a scheme by the Department of Fisheries, Government of Goa. Through this scheme, a 50% subsidy is provided to the fishermen of Goa for the purchase of Singel Net/ Small Rampon Net and its accessories.

fields.schemeName: Non-Governmental Aided Organization (Special Schools And Vocational Training Centre) For Disabled
fields.briefDescription: In this scheme, Special Education is provided to children with disability who are below the age of 18 years. The child should be enrolled in a special school run by a Non-Governmental Aided Organization. Vocational Training is given to special children above the age of 18 years.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Finance
fields.schemeName: Senior Citizens Saving Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Introduced in 2004 by the Govt. of India, SCSS offers a steady stream of income for individuals over 60 years old. As it is a government-backed scheme, there is minimal risk associated with SCSS. Individuals can apply for this scheme in post offices and public and private banks.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister Housing Assistance Programme
fields.briefDescription: The Objective of the 'Chief Minister Housing Assistance Program is to provide durable roofing materials to improve their existing houses to the Economically Weaker Section (EWS) and to provide dwelling houses to the Low Income Group (LIG) families living in the State.

fields.schemeName: Boarding House Stipend Scheme (Tripura Govt.)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme of "Boarding House Stipend" was introduced by the Tribal Welfare Department, Directorate of Tribal Welfare, Govt. of Tripura to improve educational scenario among Scheduled Tribes people.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
fields.schemeName: National Scheme Of Welfare Of Fishermen
fields.briefDescription: The National Scheme of Welfare of Fishermen provides financial assistance to fishermen. They can use these for constructing houses and community halls for both recreation and work purposes. Further, through the amount availed under this scheme, fishermen can install tube wells.

fields.schemeName: Children Education Assistance Fund
fields.briefDescription: Children Education Assistance Fund (CEAF) is a scheme launched by the Nagaland state government to provide financial assistance to children who are studying in classes 1 to 10 in government schools. The scheme aims to ensure that no child is deprived of education due to financial constraints.

fields.schemeName: Scheme For Subsidy On Interest For Establishment Of 1 To 20 Milch Animal Farm
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Scheme for Subsidy on Interest for Establishment of 1 to 20 Milch Animal Farm for the State Cattle Breeders” was started by the Dept. of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Government of Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: Swanirbhar Naari
fields.briefDescription: The Swanirbhar Naari scheme, initiated by the Directorate of Handloom & Textiles, Assam, aims to promote traditional hand-woven items by procuring them directly from indigenous weavers.

fields.schemeName: Scholarship For Cadets Of Sainik School Imphal
fields.briefDescription:
The objective of the Scheme is to provide financial assistance to Mizo students permanently
residing in the States of studying at Sainik School Imphal, to enable them to qualify and joint National Defence Academy and further to the Armed Forces.

fields.schemeName: Mukhya Mantri Sahara Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The State Government has launched the 'Sahara Scheme' to provide financial assistance of Rs. 3000 per month to the patients belonging to the economically weaker sections of the society, who are suffering from specified diseases such Parkinson, Malignant Cancer, Paralysis etc.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister's COVID-19 Affected Livelihood Support Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The guidelines of the "Chief Minister's COVID-19 Affected Livelihood Support Scheme" were approved by the Dept. of Social Welfare, Govt. of Manipur. The COVID-19 Pandemic and the resulting economic dislocations have severely affected the livelihood of a large percentage of the population.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Chiranjeevi Swasthya Beema Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The state government has announced the implementation of 'Universal Health Coverage' in the state in the budget announcement 2021-22, in compliance of which Chief Minister Chiranjeevi Health Insurance Scheme was started in the state from May 1, 2021.

fields.schemeName: Sudakshya For Girls Child Scholarship
fields.briefDescription: This scholarship provides financial assistance to all deserving students who want to pursue higher studies.  Under this scholarship scheme, the students fulfilling the eligibility criteria will receive a maintenance allowance and other benefits.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: National Awards For Outstanding Services In The Field Of Prevention Of Alcoholism And Substance (Drug) Abuse: Best Educational Institution Doing Outstanding Work In Awareness Generation And Prevention Of Alcoholism And Substance (Drug) Abuse
fields.briefDescription: The Scheme of "National Awards for Outstanding Services in the field of Prevention of Alcoholism and Substance (Drug) Abuse" by the MoSJE, GoI shall be applicable to Institutions and Individuals working in the field of Prevention of Alcoholism and Substance (Drug) Abuse.

fields.schemeName: Lokprasar Prakalpo Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Lokprasar Prakalpo Scheme” was launched by the Department of Information & Cultural Affairs, Government of West Bengal in 2014 to revive the Folk and Tribal Culture in their respective genre across various zones and districts in the State.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance To Ex-Convicts
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Financial Assistance to Ex-Convicts” was launched by the Department of Social Justice, Government of Kerala. This scheme is implemented by the Department of Social Justice to help those released from jail from poor economic conditions to find their livelihood.

fields.schemeName: NAMO E-Tablet Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Namo Tablet Yojana in Gujarat is a state-specific version of the central government's PM Tablet Scheme. The scheme was launched in 2017 by the Gujarat government and aims to distribute tablets to around 3.5 lakh students in the state.

fields.schemeName: Marriage Assistance To Differently Abled Women (Parinayam-II)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Marriage Assistance to Differently Abled Women (Parinayam-II)” was launched by the Department of Social Justice, Government of Kerala.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to Sportspersons to Pursue Sports Coaching Courses Conducted by SAI, NSNIS, Patiala as a Part of Skill Development Programme to Improve their Employability
fields.briefDescription: The Scheme was launched by the Department of Sports & Youth Services Department, Government of Odisha to provide financial assistance to sportspersons of Odisha to help them become qualified coaches, by undertaking SAI, NSNIS coaching courses, so as to improve their employability.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Education
fields.schemeName: AICTE-SHORT TERM TRAINING PROGRAMME (STTP) (UT-J&K,LADAKH AND NER)
fields.briefDescription: AICTE-Short Term Training Program (STTP) intends to conduct faculty training through financial assistance from AICTE to enable faculty members in the field of technical education.

fields.schemeName: Biju Patnaik Sports Award for Lifetime Achievement in Promotion of Sports & Games
fields.briefDescription: The award is given to the sportspersons who have not only good performances at National and International levels but also have continued to contribute to the promotion of sports and games in his/her individual capacity even after retirement from an active sporting career.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
fields.schemeName: Intellectual Property Right Scheme Under MSME Innovative Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Intellectual Property Right Scheme offers legal and intellectual property filing support including patents, trademarks, copyrights, designs, geographical indications (GI) etc.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to Former Sports Person of UP
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Financial Assistance to Former Sports Person of UP” was launched by the Department of Sports, Government of Uttar Pradesh to provide financial assistance to sports persons who are old, weak, or facing hardships, under a scheme for the welfare of sports person of the state.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Education
fields.schemeName: AICTE-LILAVATI AWARD
fields.briefDescription: AICTE-LILAVATI AWARD intends to recognize efforts being made by AICTE-approved institutions to treat women with ‘equality and fairness’ in all spheres of their lives.

fields.schemeName: Free Supply of Rice to the Poor People
fields.briefDescription: In this scheme, 10 kg of free rice is supplied to poor people through fair-price shops during natural calamities and on two important festive occasions every year. The beneficiaries are identified based on the data from the Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs Department in Puducherry.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Education
fields.schemeName: AICTE- Technical University Joint Training Programs for Librarians
fields.briefDescription: AICTE- Technical University Joint Training Programs for Librarians, aims to provide financial assistance in conducting training to librarians to prepare them for being successful and effective in a knowledge society.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
fields.schemeName: Export Promotion Council Membership Reimbursement Scheme for Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe
fields.briefDescription: Export Promotion Council Membership Reimbursement Scheme provides  reimbursement to an SC/ST Micro & small enterprises(MSEs), on annual membership subscription fee / one-time subscription charges/entry fee charged by various Export Promotion Councils (EPC).

fields.schemeName: Reimbursement of College Fees for Scheduled Caste Students in Professional Colleges (Top 20)
fields.briefDescription: Through this scheme, reimbursement of tuition fees and examination fees is facilitated for students who have achieved marks above 75% in the Higher Secondary Course Examination and secured a place in the 'Top 20' Rank. The scheme aims to alleviate the financial burden on eligible students.

fields.schemeName: MMKY-New Tank Excavation Under Brackish Water Aquaculture
fields.briefDescription: The State plan scheme “MMKY-New Tank Excavation Under Brackish Water Aquaculture” was launched by the Fisheries & Animal Resources Development Department, Government of to promote farmers and entrepreneurs to take up Brackish water aquaculture.

fields.schemeName: Health Check-up (A.B.O.C.W.W.B)
fields.briefDescription: Registered construction workers having continuous membership of the Board can avail an amount of ₹5,000/- once in a year for his/ her annual health checkup in any Hospital.

fields.schemeName: Opening and Maintenance of Boys and Girls Hostels
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Opening and Maintenance of Boys and Girls Hostels” by the Adi Dravidar Welfare Dept, Government of Puducherry, provides boarding/lodging and hostel facilities to Scheduled Caste students in pursuance of their education and to dissuade dropping of education at school and college level.

fields.schemeName: General Pension (A.B.O.C.W.W.B)
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, a pension shall be given to a registered beneficiary working as a building worker for not less than one year after the commencement of the Rules on completion of sixty years of age.

fields.schemeName: Incentive Award to Inter-Caste Married Couples
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Incentive Award to Inter-Caste Married Couples” was introduced by the Adi Dravidar Welfare Department, Government of Puducherry. The objective of the scheme is to reduce the effect of untouchability and as a step towards bringing about a casteless society.

fields.schemeName: Grant Of Incentive For Marriage Between Differently Abled Person And Normal Persons
fields.briefDescription: “Grant Of Incentive For Marriage Between Differently Abled Person And Normal Persons” by the Dept of Social Welfare, Govt of Puducherry supports marriages between differently-abled individuals and those without disabilities. An incentive of ₹1,00,000/- is provided (₹20,000 as cash, and ₹80 as NSC).

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Rajya Bridhhabasta Pension Yojana
fields.briefDescription: “Mukhyamantri Rajya Bridhhabasta Pension Yojana” is a Social Security Scheme by the Department of Women, Child Development & Social Security, Government of Jharkhand. The scheme provides financial asistance to the age group of 60 years and above.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Rajya Nirashrit Mahila Samman Pension Yojana
fields.briefDescription: “Mukhyamantri Rajya Nirashrit Mahila Samman Pension Yojana” is a Social Security Scheme by the Department of Women, Child Development & Social Security, Government of Jharkhand, that aims to provide social security to women who are unable to sustain themselves with their own resources.

fields.schemeName: Perunthalaivar Karma Veerar Kamarajar Scheme of Financial Assistance Towards Funeral Expenses of the Differently Abled Persons
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Perunthalaivar Karma Veerar Kamarajar Scheme of Financial Assistance Towards Funeral Expenses of the Differently Abled Persons" was launched by the Dept of Social Welfare, Govt of Puducherry. In this scheme, financial assistance of ₹ 15,000/- is provided to meet the funeral expenses.

fields.schemeName: Annual Tour to the Differently Abled Persons
fields.briefDescription: “Annual Tour to the Differently Abled Persons” was launched by the Dept of Social Welfare, Govt of Puducherry to allow the PwDs to see the places of cultural and historic importance and acquaint themselves with various aspects of our cultural heritage.

fields.schemeName: Mukhya Mantri Yuva Udyami Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Mukhya Mantri Yuva Udyami Yojana" was launched on 1st August 2014 by the Department of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Government of Madhya Pradesh. The scheme provides loans to the citizens of Madhya Pradesh who want to set up their industries.

fields.schemeName: Mukhya mantri Swarojgar Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide benefits financial assistance, interest subsidies, and a guarantee. the government of Madhya Pradesh gives loans to the state's citizens to establish employment so that all citizens can start employment.

fields.schemeName: Floriculture Development Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to motivate the farmers to take up floriculture (traditional and non-traditional flowers) as a commercial venture through the distribution of planting materials and other inputs.

fields.schemeName: Maintenance of Horti Hubs
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to procure good quality disease-free and commercially accepted varieties of the identified flowers and multiply and, to serve as a demonstration cum training ground for those who are interested in Floriculture and who intend to make this as their means of livelihood.

fields.schemeName: Plant Protection Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to control pests and diseases including weeds and rodents of horticultural crops by the distribution of bio-pesticides/Bio-agents and equipment at 50% subsidy.

fields.schemeName: Supply of Radio to the Blind Persons
fields.briefDescription: “Supply of Radio to the Blind Persons" was launched by the Dept of Social Welfare, Govt of Puducherry. In this scheme, a radio is provided to the blind person for recreation. The applicant should have disability of 40% or above, and should be a Native/Resident of Puducherry.

fields.schemeName: Observation Home and Special School
fields.briefDescription: “Observation Home and Special School" was launched by the Dept of Social Welfare, Govt of Puducherry. The scheme aims to take care of the children who are juvenile delinquents by providing a home to them where their basic needs are taken care of including general and vocational education.

fields.schemeName: Grant of Stipend to the Differently Abled Trainees of the Vocational Training Institutes
fields.briefDescription: Through this scheme, the differently abled persons undergoing any technical or professional training through Institutes are paid a fixed monthly stipend which will enable them to secure the training successfully in order to make their own earnings and become useful members of the society.

fields.schemeName: Award of Scholarship to Differently Abled Person Students
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Award of Scholarship to Differently Abled Person Students” by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry is introduced to provide scholarship to the differently abled students, studying from Class 1st upto Postgraduate/ Professional courses.

fields.schemeName: State Agriculture Scholarship for B.Sc. & M.Sc. Agriculture
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “State Agriculture Scholarship for B.Sc. & M.Sc. Agriculture” was launched by the Department of Agriculture, Government of Nagaland to provide educational assistance to students who are undergoing undergraduate (B.Sc. Agriculture) and post-graduate programme (M.Sc. Agriculture).

fields.schemeName: Pension Scheme for Cancer Patients
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Pension Scheme for Cancer Patients" was launched by the Directorate of Social Welfare and Social Education, Government of Tripura. The scheme aims to provide a monthly pension of ₹2,000/- to the person suffering from cancer.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Women and Child Development
fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Rashtriya Bal Puraskar
fields.briefDescription: The Pradhan Mantri Rashtriya Bal Puraskar (PMRBP) is organized to celebrate the energy, determination, ability, zeal, and enthusiasm of our children.

fields.schemeName: Nanaji Deshmukh Krishi Sanjivani Prakalp
fields.briefDescription: The project aims to enhance climate-resilience and profitability of smallholder farming systems in 15 project districts of Maharashtra through promotion of climate resilient technology and commodity value chain across approximately 5,000 drought-prone and/or sodicity/salinity affected villages.

fields.schemeName: Namo Shetkari Mahasanman Nidhi Yojana
fields.briefDescription: To increase the income of farmers, State government has announced "Namo Shetkari Mahasanman Nidhi Yojana" in which cultivable land holding farmer families of the state will get an additional amount of Rs. 6000/- per year (along with Rs. 6000/- through Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojana

fields.schemeName: "Vocational Training" Component of the "Development of Industries" Scheme
fields.briefDescription: "Vocational Training" by the Department of Industries and Commerce, Union Territory of Puducherry aims to create more employment opportunities broadly for the unemployed youth particularly women to pursue wide career openings besides self-ventures by giving training in trades.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Samajik Sahayata Prakalpa - Persons with Disabilities
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Mukhyamantri Samajik Sahayata Prakalpa - Persons with Disabilities" was launched by the Directorate of Social Welfare and Social Education, Government of Tripura to provide financial assistance to Persons with Disabilities in the form of a monthly pension of ₹2,000/-.

fields.schemeName: "Exhibition" Component of the "Development Of Handicrafts" Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Exhibition" scheme by the Department of Industries and Commerce, Government of Puducherry, was introduced to boost the marketability of handicrafts and enhance sales through the organization of exhibitions. These exhibitions are conducted locally and in various states of the country.

fields.schemeName: "Management Training" Component of the "Development of Industries" Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Through this scheme, management training is imparted as means to enhance productivity. It is imparted to the entrepreneurs / industrialists or their representative in various disciplines namely Financial Management, Marketing Management, Personnel Management, Quality control, etc.

fields.schemeName: "Entrepreneureship Development Programme (EDP)" Component of the "Development of Industries" Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to to develop entrepreneurship skills by providing training for setting up of the projects. The programmes contains motivating the prospective entrepreneurs, highlight respective projects, the course of actions to taken by them for setting up and successful running their unit.

fields.schemeName: State Horticulture Scholarship
fields.briefDescription: The “State Horticulture Scholarship” is a scholarship scheme, launched by the Department of Horticulture, Government of Nagaland to provide scholarship/stipend to students who are pursuing B.Sc. (Horticulture) M.Sc. (Horticulture) Ph.D. (Horticulture) courses.

fields.schemeName: 60% and above Disability Allowances
fields.briefDescription: "60% and Disability Allowance" is a pension scheme by the Directorate of Social Welfare and Social Education, Govt of Tripura. The scheme aims to provide financial assistance in the form of a monthly pension of ₹2,000/- to differently-abled persons with a disability of 60% and above.

fields.schemeName: "Grant To Handicrafts Societies" Component of the "Development of Handicrafts" Scheme
fields.briefDescription: “Grant To Handicrafts Societies” by the Department of Industries and Commerce, UT of Puducherry aims to encourage the creation of Handicrafts Societies to enhance coordination and skill among craftspeople. Grants are provided to registered societies for organizing or participating in exhibitions.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Samajik Sahayata Prakalpa - Old and Infirm
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Mukhyamantri Samajik Sahayata Prakalpa- Old and Infirm" was launched by the Directorate of Social Welfare and Social Education, Government of Tripura. This scheme aims to provide financial assistance to poor people of Tripura who are old and infirm, such as senior citizens.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Communication
fields.schemeName: Telecom Technology Development Fund
fields.briefDescription:
The Telecom Technology Development Fund Scheme (hereinafter referred to as ‘Scheme’) has been
notified for domestic companies and institutions involved in technology design, development,
commercialization of telecommunication products and solutions to enable affordable broadband and mobile services.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: National Award For Senior Citizens (vayoshreshtha Samman): Best Institution For Providing Services To Senior Citizens And Awareness Generation
fields.briefDescription: The "Vayoshreshtha Samman: Best Institution for Providing Services to Senior Citizens and Awareness Generation" award shall be given to institutions with a record of providing services to the elderly, especially indigent senior citizens. The awards are conferred on 1st October every year.
